Camera camera1 supports low_res and high_res. Camera camera0 supports low_res. Rocks can be sampled at the following location(s): waypoint1. Soil can be sampled at the following location(s): waypoint1. Rovers rover0 and rover1 are available. Store(s) store0 and store1 are empty. The goal is to reach a state where the following facts hold: Rock data was communicated from waypoint waypoint1;, Image objective1 was communicated in mode low_res, Image objective0 was communicated in mode low_res, and Soil data was communicated from waypoint waypoint1;.
